text: niccayamaka evarkal tankalitam vanta allahvutaiya vacanankalaipparri enta ataramuminrit tarkkam ceykinrarkalo, avarkalutaiya irutayankalil perumai tavira (veru etuvum) illai anal a(p perumaiyana)tai avarkal ataiyavum mattarkal; akave (napiye!) Nir allahvitame patukaval tetuviraka! Niccayamaka avan, yavarraiyum ceviyerpavan, parppavan
